sentences.en: a tennis player with a highly individual style
sentences.cn: 风格非常独特的网球选手

sentences.en: a very individual way of dressing
sentences.cn: 非常有个性的衣着方式

sentences.en: Choose a soft, medium or firm mattress to suit their individual needs.
sentences.cn: 针对他们各人不同的需要挑选柔软、软硬适中或者坚硬的床垫。

sentences.en: Each individual flower is tiny.
sentences.cn: 每一朵花都很小。

sentences.en: Each individual leaf on the tree is different.
sentences.cn: 树上每片叶子都不相同。

sentences.en: Each individual receives two genes, one inherited from each parent.
sentences.cn: 每个人都有两种基因，分别来自父亲和母亲。

sentences.en: Margaret was always mischievous and set on her own individual course.
sentences.cn: 玛格丽特总是调皮捣乱，而且一意孤行。

sentences.en: Moreau took gold in the five-kilometre individual pursuit competition.
sentences.cn: 莫罗在个人五公里追逐赛中获得金牌。

sentences.en: Most churches were built with donations from private individuals (= ordinary people, rather than the government or companies ).
sentences.cn: 大多数教堂都是由私人捐款建成的。

sentences.en: She won the individual gold medal at the Winter Olympics.
sentences.cn: 她在冬奥会上获得了个人金牌。

sentences.en: The individual's whole personality appears to be permanently warped.
sentences.cn: 这个人的整个人格似乎被永远地扭曲了。

sentences.en: The levels of tolerable pain vary greatly from individual to individual.
sentences.cn: 对疼痛的耐受程度因人而异，差别很大。

sentences.en: The map, on a scale of 1:10,000, shows over 5,000 individual paths.
sentences.cn: 该地图以1：10,000的比例尺显示了5,000多条不同道路。

sentences.en: the needs of the individual customer
sentences.cn: 每位顾客的需求

sentences.en: the rights of the individual
sentences.cn: 个人权利

sentences.en: The services are attractively priced and are tailored to suit individual requirements.
sentences.cn: 服务费价格诱人且内容按个人需求量身定制。

sentences.en: They prefer to bargain with individual clients, for cash.
sentences.cn: 在现款方面，他们更愿意同散户打交道。

sentences.en: They wait for the group to decide rather than making individual decisions.
sentences.cn: 他们等待团体作决定而不是各自作出决定。

sentences.en: This was a matter for decision by the individual.
sentences.cn: 这件事需要个人自己决定。

sentences.en: Tourism is up, jobs are up, individual income is up.
sentences.cn: 旅游火了，工作机会多了，个人收入涨了。

sentences.en: Twist the mixture into individual sausages without splitting the skins.
sentences.cn: 将混合物拧成一段段的香肠，不要把皮弄破。

sentences.en: Whether such properties are a good deal will depend on individual situations.
sentences.cn: 这样的地产是否可获得大笔收益还要视具体情形而定。

words.tran_cn: 个人主义的；利己主义的
个人的；有个性的；具有个人特色的
个人主义；利己主义；个人特征
利己主义者，个人主义者
使…个性化；分别详述（individualize的过去分词）
赋予个性；个别处理；使适应个别需要
个别化；表现区别；一一列举；赋予个性；使个体化

phrases.tran_cn: 个人价值，个体价值；个别值

trans.tran_en: considered separately from other people or things in the same group
a person, considered separately from the rest of the group or society that they live in
